name: Bot Battle Beta Demo
description: Battle it out in this low-poly, top-down shooter with up to 4 players! This demo only features 2 maps as of now. In the full version, there will be up to 10 maps to duke it out on, as well as a solo mode involving waves of enemies! This game includes controller support, but be sure to check out the screenshots or the in-game options menu to see the controller mapping of your controller of choice.
